verses.text:
\w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* also \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me to \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* thee \add to be\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: now therefore \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* thou unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, I \w remember|strong="H6485"\w* \add that\add* which \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, how he \w laid|strong="H7760"\w* \add wait\add* for him in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, when he came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

Now \w go|strong="H3212"\w* and \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*, and utterly \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w* all that they have, and \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* them not; but \w slay|strong="H4191"\w* both \w man|strong="H0376"\w* and \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w infant|strong="H5768"\w* and \w suckling|strong="H3243"\w*, \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* and \w sheep|strong="H7716"\w*, \w camel|strong="H1581"\w* and \w ass|strong="H2543"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w gathered|strong="H8085"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w together|strong="H8085"\w*, and \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* them in \w Telaim|strong="H2923"\w*, two \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w footmen|strong="H7273"\w*, and \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*, and laid \w wait|strong="H7378"\w* in the \w valley|strong="H5158"\w*.\f + \fr 15.5 \ft laid…: or, fought\f*

¶ And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w Kenites|strong="H7017"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w depart|strong="H5493"\w*, get you \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*, lest I \w destroy|strong="H0622"\w* you with them: for ye \w shewed|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* to all the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when they came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* out of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*. So the \w Kenites|strong="H7017"\w* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w Amalekites|strong="H6003"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w* from \w Havilah|strong="H2341"\w* \add until\add* thou \w comest|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Shur|strong="H7793"\w*, that \add is\add* over \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

And he \w took|strong="H8610"\w* \w Agag|strong="H0090"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w* \w alive|strong="H2416"\w*, and utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*.

But \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w spared|strong="H2550"\w* \w Agag|strong="H0090"\w*, and the \w best|strong="H4315"\w* of the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and of the \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and of the \w fatlings|strong="H4932"\w*, and the \w lambs|strong="H3733"\w*, and all \add that was\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, and \w would|strong="H0014"\w* not utterly \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w* them: but every \w thing|strong="H4399"\w* \add that was\add* \w vile|strong="H5240"\w* and \w refuse|strong="H4549"\w*, that they destroyed \w utterly|strong="H2763"\w*.\f + \fr 15.9 \ft fatlings: or, second sort\f*
¶ Then came the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

It \w repenteth|strong="H5162"\w* me that I have set \w up|strong="H4427"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \add to be\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: for he is turned \w back|strong="H7725"\w* from \w following|strong="H0310"\w* me, and hath not \w performed|strong="H6965"\w* my \w commandments|strong="H1697"\w*. And it \w grieved|strong="H2734"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*; and he \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* all \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.

And when \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* rose \w early|strong="H7925"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, it was \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w*, and, behold, he set him \w up|strong="H5324"\w* a \w place|strong="H3027"\w*, and is gone \w about|strong="H5437"\w*, and passed \w on|strong="H5674"\w*, and gone \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*: and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* thou of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: I have \w performed|strong="H6965"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add meaneth\add* then this \w bleating|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* in mine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w*, and the \w lowing|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* which I \w hear|strong="H8085"\w*?

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, They have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* them from the \w Amalekites|strong="H6003"\w*: for the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w spared|strong="H2550"\w* the \w best|strong="H4315"\w* of the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* and of the \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, to \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*; and the \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* we have utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w*.

Then \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w Stay|strong="H7503"\w*, and I will \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* thee what the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w said|strong="H1696"\w* to me this \w night|strong="H3915"\w*. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Say \w on|strong="H1696"\w*.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, When thou \add wast\add* \w little|strong="H6996"\w* in thine own \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, \add wast\add* thou not \add made\add* the \w head|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* thee \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* thee on a \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* and utterly \w destroy|strong="H2763"\w* the \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*, and \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against them until they be \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w*.\f + \fr 15.18 \ft they…: Heb. they consume them\f*

Wherefore then didst thou not \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, but didst \w fly|strong="H5860"\w* upon the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*, and \w didst|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*?

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, Yea, I have \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and have \w gone|strong="H3212"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* me, and have \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w Agag|strong="H0090"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Amalek|strong="H6002"\w*, and have utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w* the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*.

But the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w*, \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* and \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, the \w chief|strong="H7225"\w* of the things which should have been utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2764"\w*, to \w sacrifice|strong="H2076"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Hath the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add as great\add* \w delight|strong="H2656"\w* in burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* and \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w*, as in \w obeying|strong="H8085"\w* the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*? Behold, to \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \add is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w*, \add and\add* to \w hearken|strong="H7181"\w* than the \w fat|strong="H2459"\w* of \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*.

For \w rebellion|strong="H4805"\w* \add is as\add* the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* of \w witchcraft|strong="H7081"\w*, and \w stubbornness|strong="H6484"\w* \add is as\add* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* and \w idolatry|strong="H8655"\w*. Because thou hast \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, he hath also \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* thee from \add being\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 15.23 \ft witchcraft: Heb. divination\f*

¶ And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, I have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*: for I have \w transgressed|strong="H5674"\w* the \w commandment|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and thy \w words|strong="H1697"\w*: because I \w feared|strong="H3372"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* their \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*.

Now therefore, I pray thee, \w pardon|strong="H5375"\w* my \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, and turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* with me, that I may \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, I will not \w return|strong="H7725"\w* with thee: for thou hast \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w rejected|strong="H3988"\w* thee from being \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And as \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* turned \w about|strong="H5437"\w* to go \w away|strong="H3212"\w*, he laid \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* upon the \w skirt|strong="H3671"\w* of his \w mantle|strong="H4598"\w*, and it \w rent|strong="H7167"\w*.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w rent|strong="H7167"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, and hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* it to a \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w* of thine, \add that is\add* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than thou.

And also the \w Strength|strong="H5331"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* will not \w lie|strong="H8266"\w* nor \w repent|strong="H5162"\w*: for he \add is\add* not a \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, that he should \w repent|strong="H5162"\w*.\f + \fr 15.29 \ft Strength: or, Eternity, or, Victory\f*

Then he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*: \add yet\add* \w honour|strong="H3513"\w* me now, I pray thee, before the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and before \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and turn \w again|strong="H7725"\w* with me, that I may \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

So \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* turned \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*; and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, Bring ye \w hither|strong="H5066"\w* to me \w Agag|strong="H0090"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amalekites|strong="H6002"\w*. And \w Agag|strong="H0090"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w* unto him \w delicately|strong="H4574"\w*. And \w Agag|strong="H0090"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Surely|strong="H0403"\w* the \w bitterness|strong="H4751"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w* is \w past|strong="H5493"\w*.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, As thy \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* hath made \w women|strong="H0802"\w* \w childless|strong="H7921"\w*, so shall thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* be \w childless|strong="H7921"\w* among \w women|strong="H0802"\w*. And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w hewed|strong="H8158"\w* \w Agag|strong="H0090"\w* in \w pieces|strong="H8158"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*.

¶ Then \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*; and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* went \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* to \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*.

And \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* came no \w more|strong="H3254"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* until the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of his \w death|strong="H4194"\w*: \w nevertheless|strong="H3588"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* \w mourned|strong="H0056"\w* for \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*: and the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w repented|strong="H5162"\w* that he had made \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
